quest.name: Anxious Rookie
journal:
Maru has a crease of consternation upon his noble brow.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.

dialogue.name: MARU
dialogue.text: One of our new recruits has been takin' his sweet time with his delivery...

dialogue.name: MARU
dialogue.text: He ain't irresponsible, just...not the best conversationalist. You think you could check in on him an' make sure he's alright?

dialogue.name: MARU
dialogue.text: He's probably loiterin' nervously around the Great Work somewhere. Give him a nudge in the right direction if he ain't makin' progress.

dialogue.name: WOMAN04556
dialogue.text: B-By the Sisters! This man just snuck up on me and started shouting! What does he want? I'm terrified to ask!

dialogue.name: MYSTERIOUSALCHEMIST04556
dialogue.text: This man has been standing here, squirming in silence for some time. Is he in distress?

dialogue.name: SHYNESSDELIVERER04556
dialogue.text: Er! Erm! ...Aaah!

dialogue.name: WOMAN04556
dialogue.text: S-Stop shouting at me! Just tell me what you want and leave me be!

dialogue.name: SHYNESSDELIVERER04556
dialogue.text: N-No, I didn't mean─! Th-The boss always says to s-speak up, so I just─! Er!

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Pause. Now take a deep breath.

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: You must speak confidently, man! From your diaphragm!

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Eye contact is key. Steady, unblinking eye contact...

dialogue.name: SHYNESSDELIVERER04556
dialogue.text: Y-You got it!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: After several uncomfortable moments, it becomes clear that this method isn't working. Try advising him again.

dialogue.name: SHYNESSDELIVERER04556
dialogue.text: D-Deep breaths? O-Okay... That... Oh, that feels better... Whooo...

dialogue.name: SHYNESSDELIVERER04556
dialogue.text: I think I can take it from here, missmister! Thanks for your help─an' tell Maru that I'll be back soon!

dialogue.name: SHYNESSDELIVERER04556
dialogue.text: Er... Errrrrr...

dialogue.name: MYSTERIOUSALCHEMIST04556
dialogue.text: He appears to be in deep thought, but I'm not certain why he wishes I bear witness to it...

dialogue.name: SHYNESSDELIVERER04556
dialogue.text: I-I knew what I was gonna say... But now I can't remember nothin'... Er...

dialogue.name: Q2
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: Have you a written list of your objectives?

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: Remember, man! Remember with sheer willpower!

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: Just start talking until you figure it out.

dialogue.name: SHYNESSDELIVERER04556
dialogue.text: Y-You got it!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: After several uncomfortable moments, it becomes clear that this method isn't working. Try advising him again.

dialogue.name: SHYNESSDELIVERER04556
dialogue.text: Oh, th-that's right! I wrote it down, didn't I? 'Cause I knew somethin' like this might happen! Ha! I got so nervous, I even forgot that I remembered that I'd forget!

dialogue.name: SHYNESSDELIVERER04556
dialogue.text: Thanks, missmister─I think I'll be alright! Tell Maru that I'll be back soon.

dialogue.name: SHYNESSDELIVERER04556
dialogue.text: I remember their name... But what did they look like again...? Oh no...

dialogue.name: Q3
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A3
dialogue.text: I'm sure Nidhana could point you in the right direction.

dialogue.name: A3
dialogue.text: Just introduce yourself to everybody here. You're bound to remember at some point!

dialogue.name: A3
dialogue.text: Start screaming their name. I'm sure someone will come running.

dialogue.name: SHYNESSDELIVERER04556
dialogue.text: I-If I could do that, I would've done it already!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The nervous Rider's shoulders slump dejectedly. Try advising him again.

dialogue.name: SHYNESSDELIVERER04556
dialogue.text: O-Oh! I was so focused on tryin' to fix it myself, I never considered askin' for help!

dialogue.name: SHYNESSDELIVERER04556
dialogue.text: Thanks, missmister! I can take it from here. Tell Maru not to worry no more!

dialogue.name: MARU
dialogue.text: So that's what he was up to... Thanks for steerin' him true.

dialogue.name: MARU
dialogue.text: His nerves can really get the better of him, but he's been downright stubborn about helpin' out with deliveries.

dialogue.name: MARU
dialogue.text: We'll keep him runnin' errands closer to home, but I hope you won't be averse to helpin' him out again, should he need it. I know it'd mean the world to him...
